name: RELOOM
description:
[ EDIT: Play windowed for better performance since fullscreen can cause lags or download the game for PC, Mac or Linux below! ]

RELOOM, developed for Brackeys Game Jam 2020 with the theme "Rewind". It`s a combination of a simple puzzle game and some platformer jump`n`run mechanics.
Just try it out!

Controls (see tutorial)
movement: A, D, SPACE
pickup block: S
place block: W
rewind time: E
